A piece of history of games, if you havn't tryed it yet, get it and play it, very recommended.
Single player experience you won't get novadays. Fun coop as well. Solving puzzles is highly educational for younger players. Must play imho

If you want a good, fun co-op game, then you this game is a definite. You must make sure you have a good duo though, since you're going to have to play the whole series with that specific person. It might ruin friendships, like it did when I befriended someone for placing the wrong portals every single time. Although the inevitable fact that the person you're playing with will become your worst enemy, you should get the game.
perfect game. coop is good too if you actually like your friend. I hated the coop, since I hate my friend. I hate him even more after playing the coop with him.

Portal 1 exceeded all my expectations but this game was able to go even beyond that! 
This is one the best sequels ever, everything is amped up from the first instalment and few extra things have been added.
The eerie, strange, apocalyptic atmosphere is still present and I just love it, for some reason it just makes the game so so much more immersive and once you go to the old parts of Aperture organization you will just be awed by the scale and details of the things.
There are a few more characters this time and all of them are fantastically voice acted and kudos to the dialogue writer(it is just amazing) Glados is still amazing and the standout, Wheatley is a great new addition, Chell remains voiceless and Cave Jhonson voiced by JK Simmons is just amazing!
This time around there is much more story to the game and if you peek around here and there a little bit you might find some really cool easter eggs that reveal a lot about the characters.
The main part of the game that is the puzzles are still amazing like Portal 1, it is just hard enough to not be impossible but to give you the satisfaction of feeling smart. A few new mechanics have been added which are great and keeps the gameplay fresh.
The graphics are great for what it is.
I encountered no bug during my gameplay.
I would recommend this 100%, the cost at which this game is available is a no brainer!
I miss when Valve made games.
